name: Mufeed VH

mufeedvh/code2prompt.summary: The code2prompt repository has had several updates recently, including the addition of o200k_base tokenizer encoding and an Idiomatic Claude XML template. Additionally, there have been improvements to the installation methods and documentation, as well as refactorings to fix clippy lints and suggestions. The repository has also seen new features such as a help menu that shows when no arguments are provided.

profile_summary:
Mufeed VH is a seasoned software developer and co-founder of getasterisk, a prominent technology company recognized by Y Combinator (S24). With a strong focus on systems security and proficiency in languages such as Rust, Julia, and Python, Mufeed has established himself as a trusted expert in his field, attracting a network of over 909 followers who value his insights and contributions. As an active developer with 44 public repositories, Mufeed continually demonstrates his technical prowess, innovation, and dedication to staying at the forefront of industry advancements.

Mufeed's extensive experience in security and systems development has equipped him with the expertise necessary to drive innovation and deliver high-quality solutions. His experience in participating in capture the flag (CTF) challenges and conferences has further honed his problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively. As a detail-oriented and technically astute professional, Mufeed continues to make significant contributions to the development community, solidifying his reputation as a go-to expert for complex systems security and software development challenges.
